title: Perpetua Watch Face
summary: A simple, clean analog watch face.
description: A simple, clean analog watch face. I made it for my own use but, hey, sharing is caring.- Displays day of week and day of month- Shows 12, 3, 6, 9 when AM and 0, 15, 18, 21 when PM- All hands are "sweeping"- Runs at 10 frames per second- Supports insets at top, left, bottom, and/or right
descriptionHTML:
A simple, clean analog watch face. I made it for my own use but, hey, sharing is caring.

- Displays day of week and day of month
- Shows 12, 3, 6, 9 when AM and 0, 15, 18, 21 when PM
- All hands are "sweeping"
- Runs at 10 frames per second
- Supports insets at top, left, bottom, and/or right
comments: Really like the look of this watch, I just wish I could always display 12,3,6, and 9
recentChanges: - Optimized drawing tick marks a bit
